text: Youngblood Hawke is a 1964 American drama movie. It was directed by Delmer Daves. The movie is based on the book of the same name by Herman Wouk. Actors include James Franciscus, Suzanne Pleshette, Genevi√®ve Page, Eva Gabor, Mary Astor, and Lee Bowman.
